bibdata.title: Amerian National Standard for High Voltage Expulsion and Current-Limiting Type Power Class Fuses and Fuse Disconnecting Switches
Amerian National Standard for High Voltage Expulsion and Current-Limiting Type Power Class Fuses and Fuse Disconnecting Switches

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard establishes specifications for high voltage (above 1000 volts) expulsion and current-limiting type power class fuses, and accessories. All of these devices are intended for use on alternating current systems.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
